summary: Completed frontend testing for 4 new changes: chat widget rename, leaders section redesign, particle face update, and full blog page. All 14 test features passed.

issues: Minor: Canvas2D console warnings about 'willReadFrequently' from particle animations - non-blocking performance optimization

context_for_next_testing_agent: 4 new homepage/blog features fully tested. Chat widget shows 'Ad Astra Smart AI Assistant', no 'POWERED BY AI'. Leaders section has alternating card layouts (Jayanthi: photo left, Nirupama: photo right). Particle animation shows face shape only. Blog page has 4 articles with 5 category filters and inline article detail view.

tested_features.chat_widget_title: PASS - Title shows 'Ad Astra Smart AI Assistant' (not 'Ad Astra Assistant')
tested_features.chat_no_powered_by_ai: PASS - No 'POWERED BY AI' text in chat widget
tested_features.chat_welcome_message: PASS - Welcome message says 'I'm the Ad Astra Smart AI Assistant'
tested_features.leaders_section_exists: PASS - Leaders Message section visible with 'A Word From Our Founders' heading
tested_features.jayanthi_card_layout: PASS - Photo on left, message on right with quote icon and sign-off
tested_features.nirupama_card_layout: PASS - Photo on right, message on left (alternating layout) with quote icon and sign-off
tested_features.leader_full_messages: PASS - Both cards show complete messages with multiple paragraphs
tested_features.particle_face_shape: PASS - Particle animation shows woman's face (head, hair, facial features) - not full body
tested_features.blog_page_hero: PASS - Hero shows 'Hiring Intelligence & Market Insights' headline
tested_features.blog_category_filters: PASS - 5 category buttons: All, Market Trends, Leadership & CXO Hiring, Workforce & RPO, Industry Insights
tested_features.blog_cards_count: PASS - 4 blog post cards displayed in 2-column grid
tested_features.blog_card_content: PASS - Cards show category tag, title, excerpt, read time, and 'Read' link
tested_features.blog_article_detail: PASS - Clicking card opens full article with structured sections and conclusion
tested_features.blog_back_button: PASS - 'Back to Insights' button returns to blog listing
